DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; ALGERIA ; LEADER OF EXTREMIST ALGERIA GROUP SLAIN
DOC.TEXT: The leader of a Muslim extremist group who was Algeria ' s most-wanted fugitive has been killed in a shootout , security_forces announced . Mourad Si Ahmed , head of the Armed Islamic Group , and nine of his followers were killed in an assault on a building in Algiers , authorities said . Ahmed , who also used the name Djafar al Afghani , led the most violent of the Muslim extremist organizations that have been waging a two-year insurgency against Algeria ' s military-installed government .
